name: Mazeskalation
description:
Mazeskalation


First try to make a Game. Hope you enjoy it -)

Description:

Confident in your judgement? Great at orientation? Trust your decision-making?
Then put your skills to the test in Mazeskalation, the all-new infinite puzzle game! Can you find the optimal path through a series of procedurally generated mazes and claim the diamond at the end before time runs out? How high will your score get? To what peaks will you climb in this test of wits, reflex and spacial awareness?
Only one way to find out...
Start thinking, start swiping, start winning!
Play Mazeskalation now!

IOS will be avialable soon -)
